1121.content:
"What happened?" Panicked, Amber asked in your voice. "Why am I in Matt's body?"

"That's a good question." Shaking, you asked.

"It's because you asked for it... Amber." Giggling, a voice replied.

You and Amber looked up to see your mothers walking up to you with a smile on their faces. "What on Earth are you talking about, Ms Sullivan?" Confused and shaken, you asked.

"That's mom to you, young lady." Lightly scolding, Ms Sullivan corrected. "At least for the next six months, anyway."

"Six months?" Startled, Amber asked. "What did you do to us?"

"Well, you wanted to be older and have more responsibilities." Smiling, Ms Sullivan said.

"You wanted to be younger and have less responsibilities." Smiling at you, mom added. "So, we decided to grant both your wishes by swapping your bodies with a special device we borrowed from a friend of ours who dabbles in high tech gadgets."

Amber began to cry and you saw mom help him to his feet. "It's not forever; we're not that mean." Comforting him, she said. "You two will switch back, regardless of where you are, in exactly six months time and we will all have a long talk."

"For now, we had better get you home... Amber." Grinning, Ms Sullivan said.

You try and make a run for it. You didn't know where you were going to run, but the flight-or-fight instinct took over. It didn't work, your new Mother, Ms Sullivan grabbed you by the arm and hauled you to her house. On the way she gave you a swat on the butt. It stinged. "Now, young lady, go up stairs to your room. Get out of those things, I am going to give you a bath."

"A bath??? I'm old enough to take a bath by myself. Besides it's the middle of the day."

"You're not old enough anymore. You only turned seven two weeks ago. You just got back from dance class. You are all sweaty. You need a bath before dinner. Now scoot before I'll give you a spanking."

You walked up the stairs, not knowing where your room was. You had never been in this house before. But once you got there, it was obvious which room must be yours. The bed with the Powerpuff girls bed sheets was the big give away. Entering the room, you sat down and tried to figure out what to do. Things didn't look good for you. You were now a seven year old girl and there were few options. Who would help you? Even your mother was in on it.

It didn't take long before Ms Sullivan entered. She looked in the drawers and found a pair of panties, a short sleeved t-shirt that said 'Girl Power' on it and some matching knit pants. "Now what about that bath?" she asked.

"I'm old enough to take my own bath."

"Not anymore," she said. "There are lots of things that you aren't old enough for now."

"Like what?"

"Well you will never be left alone for one. There will always be an adult with you like me or a babysitter. You can't cross the street or walk in a parking lot without holding my hand. You have to sit in the car seat in the back of the car from now on. There are lots and lots of things. Tomorrow you and I will wait for the bus to take you to first grade"

"That was for Amber, but I'm not really a little girl. Not inside."

"You are a little girl inside and out. Now strip."

The room full of giggling girls grew silent and respectful. A classical melody began playing over the speakers, and the instructor started leading the girls in their ballet routine.

You find yourself just “going with the flow.”

You beamed with pride.

Mark my words, ladies: you will see Amber as a professional dancer. Wouldn't the rest of you like to achieve that as well?”

Some of the other girls gave you jealous looks, but you still felt pretty happy about the day. The only thing really bothering you was the name “Matthew Johnson.” Why was that name important? Something about it seemed crucial. It worried and nagged you that you couldn't make heads or tails of this strange urgent need to find “Matthew Johnson” and … and what?

Ask him some questions you supposed. But questions about what? What would a dumb, stinky boy now about ballet?

The rest of the day passed 'normally'. The class ended you got home, you played with your dolls, but somehow they didn't seem that fun. At 8:30 your mom said it was bed time and you got ready to go to sleep.

You woke up early and realized what had happened. You were trapped in this girl's body and you needed to get back to your own body and your own life. You didn't want to be a little girl of any age. What you wanted to do was to be left alone so you could think of a plan to get back to being you. The only way for that to happen was for you to meet your old body.
